description:
September 16, 2025: Version 2 Released
The purpose of Version 2 was to reduce the unnecessarily large file size. I have succeeded in significantly reducing the file size.

Have you ever felt that the “sound effects” tag is not effective enough?　Then I have created a LoRA to enhance the tag.

Known issues
1. Decreased letter accuracy
2. checkpoints with poorly rendered “sound effects” are not improved much by using this LoRA

Trigger Tag: sound effects

recommended weight
LoRA weight: 1
“sound effects” tag weight: 1 or more
e.g. -> (sound effects:1.5), <lora:sound_effects-000015:1>
creator: 5chneewei55

description:
1.0:

如果你喜欢我的产品, 请不妨点个赞或者使用它发布作品.

很欢迎您为我反馈使用体验, 以供我修正错误与优化细节.

If you like my Lora. please give it a thumbs up or use it to publish your work.

You are welcome to give me feedback on your experience so that I can correct errors and optimize details.

Recommended Weight: 0.7-1.0

Main Prompt:

lemuen_\(arknights\) ,

Perfomance:

pink eyes , pink hair ,  straight_hair,  white halo,energy wings,

Outfits:

white choker , 
cropped jacket, white_shirt,cross-laced dress , bustier, belt buckle,arm belt,zipper, 
zettai ryouiki, flower_ornament ,lace-up boots,

Other items:

sniper rifle, wheelchair,

Tips:

角色换装请降低lora权重和主关键词权重.

Please lower the lora weight and main keyword weight when u wanna changing the uniform.

请善用标签, 如果只添加服装关键词, 调整权重可用直接用于更换其他角色的服装. 相当于服装lora.

Please make good use of prompt. if you only add clothing prompts, you can adjusting the weight to directly change the clothing of other characters. Equivalent to Clothing lora.

Logs:

正常权重下, 服装和鞋子基本绑定在角色上了

轮椅和狙击枪只是进行了训练, 并未对互动动作进行优化

换装不是很方便.

发型有飘散的趋势, 目前不准备修正. 设定不准

.

.

.

.

.
creator: robertlu1021

description:
Support my work and get exclusive NSFW models at DeviantArt or Booth.pm. Please rate and leave a like if you enjoyed it, and follow for new content.

Tags: qos

Usage: qos on [placing]

Examples: qos on breasts, qos on ass, qos on face, qos on shoulder

The training was tailored for Illustrious anime models (e.g. WAI-NSFW, Hassaku XL, Prefect illustrious XL). I recommend using at least the quality tag "masterpiece" in your prompt. Recommended parameters: Euler a, 20-30 steps, CFG 4-7.
creator: psoft

description:
在1426张图片上训练，使用一张RTX 5090。

触发词：

BAstyle

你可以尝试组合下列prompts，但不是必须的：

cold tone / warm tone 
red theme / aqua theme / blue theme / purple theme / yellow theme / grey theme / orange theme / pink theme

Trained on 1,426 images using a single RTX 5090.

Trigger word:

BAstyle

You can try combining the following prompts, but it's not required:

cold tone / warm tone 
red theme / aqua theme / blue theme / purple theme / yellow theme / grey theme / orange theme / pink theme
creator: QR0W_

description:

如果你喜欢我的产品, 请不妨点个收藏或者使用它发布作品. 欢迎您为我反馈使用体验, 以供我制作更好的lora.

If you like my product, please add it to your collection or use it to publish your work. You are welcome to give me feedback on your experience so that I can make a better Lora.

Recommended Weight: 0.7-1

Main Prompt:

exusiai_the_new_covenant_\(arknights\),

Performance:

red hair, orange eyes, one side up, swept bangs  ,  

energy wings  , traditional_halo , earrings ,

Outfits:

fingerless gloves,   cropped jacket ,   open jacket , black shorts , thigh strap  , white thighhighs,  jewelry , sneakers ,

Other:

Tips:

角色换装请降低lora权重和主关键词权重.

Please lower the lora weight and main keyword weight when u wanna changing the uniform.

请善用标签, 如果只添加服装关键词, 调整权重可用直接用于更换其他角色的服装. 相当于服装lora.

Please make good use of prompt. if you only add clothing prompts, you can adjusting the weight to directly change the clothing of other characters. Equivalent to Clothing lora.

description:
If you want to use more my checkpoint online generation, please visit here.

https://tensor.art/u/762555264535746522

WAI-NSFW-illustrious-SDXL - SeaArt AI Model

WAI_NSFW-illustrious-SDXL_NSFW-illustrious-SDXL_NSFW-illustrious-SDXL_NSFW-illustrious-SDXL-Checkpoint-WAI-Shakker

If you are using WEBUI, please be sure to use this plugin as it can conveniently generate combinations of characters and actions.

WAI-NSFW-illustrious-SDXL V8.0 模型人物提示器 / Built-in Character Prompt Generator (對應V8以上版本) | Civitai

This plugin can directly suggest thousands of existing character models, along with a feature for randomly selecting characters.

V8-V12 are all well compatible.

Character Select SAA

This is a Stand Alone App with AI prompt, Semi-auto Tag Complete and ComfyUI/WebUI API support.

Now supports 5058 (includes multiple costumes) Character list.

https://github.com/mirabarukaso/character_select_stand_alone_app

One-Click embedded package
In case you don't know how to build your own Python enverment, try the embeded_env_for_SAA
Down and unzip to your computer
Db-click #run_XX.bat

https://huggingface.co/datasets/flagrantia/character_select_stand_alone_app/resolve/main/embeded_env_for_SAA.zip
下载解压到任意目录，运行 #run_CN  
Download and extract to any directory. Run #run_CN or #run_EN

Online Quick search character

Character Select Saa - a Hugging Face Space by flagrantia

Please do not add too many quality and aesthetic-related tags, nor overly long negative prompts, as this will actually reduce image quality and make it more blurry.

v15

  1. Base ill 1.0

  2. added data (roughly up to May 2025, mainly popular social games and some anime).PS:The new character data hasn’t been fully fixed yet. I’ll continue to improve it in the upcoming versions.

  3. Data adjustment, trying to reduce the chance of watermarks appearing.

Recommended settings:

Steps: 15-30

CFG scale: 5-7

Sampler: Euler a

The VAE is already integrated, please do not ask such questions anymore.

use size larger than1024x1024 for the original dimensions.

Hires upscale: 1.5, Hires steps: 20, Hires upscaler: R-ESRGAN 4x+ Anime6B,Denoising strength: 0.35~0.5

There are four safety rating tags: general, sensitive, nsfw,explicit.
Users are expected to consciously add "nsfw" to negative prompts to filter inappropriate content.

Positive Prompt

masterpiece,best quality,

Negative Prompt

bad quality,worst quality,worst detail,

V5-V14 User Manual

V1-V4 are outdated,please do not download them anymore.


This is a list of characters that have been tested and are implementable on V11.

sieecc/WAI-NSFW-illustrious-SDXL at main

These are just temporary and not all tests have been completed yet; more will be added subsequently.

Recommended settings:

Steps: 25-40

CFG scale: 5-7

Sampler: Euler a

The VAE is already integrated, please do not ask such questions anymore.

use size larger than1024x1024 for the original dimensions.

Hires upscale: 1.5, Hires steps: 20, Hires upscaler: R-ESRGAN 4x+ Anime6B,Denoising strength: 0.35~0.5

There are four safety rating tags: general, sensitive, nsfw,explicit.
Users are expected to consciously add "nsfw" to negative prompts to filter inappropriate content.

Positive Prompt

masterpiece,best quality,amazing quality,

Negative Prompt

bad quality,worst quality,worst detail,sketch,censor,
creator: WAI0731

description:
💖 Support & Share the Magic!
Love these embeddings? Like, add to collection, and tag this resource in your creations—I’d adore to see what you make! 🎨✨

👉 Looking for amazing anime model? Check out JANKU by yours truly, you won't be disappointed. It is highly tested with my embedding! It also has ONSITE generation support!

👉 More goodies on my profile! Follow for updates!

👉 Join me on our discord server (https://discord.gg/tWrKk3jcXx)! Share art, ask for help, or just chat. We have CivChan bot plus games there!


☕ Support future updates: Buy me a coffee or tip buzz! Every bit helps. Thank you for fueling the art! 🚀

Want to improve your images with zero effort even more? ✨

TrendCraft is the only detailer LoRA trained on the last 30 days of trending CivitAI images —just plug into Pony XL , Illustrious , SDXL, or Noob Vpred workflows for instant, viral-ready upgrades. No prompts, no work. 🪄🔥

🎨 Lazy Embeddings: For Creators Who Hate Typing (But Love Results) 🛋️

Why waste time typing prompts? 💤
Lazy Embeddings = pre-loaded magic for Illustrious/NoobAI/SDXL/Pony XL. Just drop lazypos + lazyneg and go . No copy-pasting, no tears.

⚡ How to Be Lazy (Illustrious/Noob/SDXL):

  1. Positive Prompt: Start with lazypos (orembedding:lazypos for ComfyUI).

  2. Negative Prompt: Start with lazyneg (or embedding:lazyneg). If you are using onsite generation, make sure to use lazyneg v3.1 or higher.

  3. Done. Seriously. 🙃

Pony XL Users:

  • Positive: lazyup (or embedding:lazyup).

  • Negative: lazydn (or embedding:lazydn).

  • Pro Tip: lazympos + lazyup = ✨ next-level quality ✨

🔥 If Hands Suck:
Add lazyhand to your NEGATIVE prompt. Too lazy? Just use lazyhand + lazyneg (boom , fixed).
🙈𝐍𝐒𝐅𝐖:

Block not safe for work with lazy𝐍𝐒𝐅𝐖 in negative prompt. If you want more use it in positive prompt!

Mature characters: Use lazy𝐥𝐨** in negative to make characters more mature and don't get flag on CivitAI!

Realism/Anime: Use lazyreal in negative if you want only anime output. In positive, if you want realistic people output.

🌟 Why Lazy Wins:

  • ⚡ Zero Effort: Skip the prompt grind.

  • 🛠️ Universal: Works with any Illustrious/Noob/Pony/SXDL model.

  • 🤖 Battle-Tested: Trained on prompts real artists actually use .

💡 Peak Laziness:
lazypos + lazyneg = flawless art with 2 words . Check the examples—it’s easier than scrolling TikTok .

Stay Lazy. Generate Smarter. 🚀
(Because life’s too short for repetitive typing.)

Protip: Embeddings don't cost any extra buzz for using. If anything, it will save you buzz since you won't generate bad images!

🛠️ Can’t See Lazy Embeddings for Onsite Generation?

  1. Enable Advanced Mode:
    Go to Account Settings → Toggle “Advanced Mode” → Now you can select Lazy Embeddings for any model.

🚀 ComfyUI Users:

  • Drop embeddings into your embeddings folder.

  • Positive Prompt: embedding:lazypos

  • Negative Prompt: embedding:lazyneg

  • Pro Tip: Use ComfyUI-Custom-Scripts for autocomplete magic! (Though lazypos/lazyneg are short enough to remember 😎)

💫Examples done with my model, JANKU:

Here is what they are doing under the hood so you don't have to type it! Please note I'm always taking feedback and updating these embeddings. I use them daily!

Illustrious XL / NoobAI / SDXL - see below for Pony XL

Positive prompt (lazypos v2.0):

masterpiece, newest, absurdres, best quality, amazing quality, very aesthetic, ultra-detailed, highly detailed

Negative prompt (lazyneg v3.0):

low quality, worst quality, lowres, username, sketch, censor, blurry, distorted, bad anatomy, signature, watermark, patreon logo, artist name

Protip: Use lazyhand embedding in NEGATIVE if you want to fix the hands for the seed!

Pony XL

Positive prompt (ponyup):

score_9, score_8_up, score_7_up, score_6_up, score_5_up, score_4_up

ponyup7 only includes score_9, score_8_up, score_7_up

ponyup6 only includes score_9, score_8_up, score_7_up, score_6_up

Negative prompt (ponydn):

score_4, score_5, score_6

Other versions:

lazympos

masterpiece, best quality, amazing quality
creator: janxd

description:
【Ananta Character】

Aileen Ananta/爱琳 无限大/無限大 - Illustriou/NoobAI

Applicable Base Models: NoobAI-XL-EPS 1.1 / Illustriou1.0

Model Information:

Model Name: Aileen

Trigger Word: ailin,1girl,blonde hair,dress,long hair,gloves,blue eyes,black gloves,maid headdress,ahoge,thighhighs,black hair,lock,multicolored hair,braid,long hair,double bun,hair bun,detached sleeves,very long hair,streaked hair,twin braids,maid,black dress,mechanical arms,frills,bow,bare shoulders,

Model Series: Illustriou / NoobAI

Training Base Model: Illustriou0.1

Usage Suggestions & Parameters (for NoobAI-XL-EPS 1.1)

The following are general references, please fine-tune according to your own needs.

LoRA Model Weight: 0.8–1.0

Sampler: Euler a

Steps: 25–30

CFG: 6 (recommended fine-tune between 6–7.5)

Resolution Recommendation: Portrait characters starting from 768×1024 / 832×1216 (extend the long side as needed)

High-Resolution Fix [Upscale]: R-ESRGAN 4x+ Anime6B / 4x-UltraSharp

Redraw Steps: 10

Redraw Strength (Denoise): 0.25–0.35

Prompt Suggestions

Negative Prompts:

text,username,logo,(low quality, worst quality:1.6),(bad anatomy),(inaccurate limb:1.2),bad composition,inaccurate eyes,extra digit,fewer digits,(extra arms:1.2),mammal,anthro,furry,
creator: Whiteside
